#include<cstdio>
int a[10];
char s[11];
int main(){
    int n;
    while(scanf("%d",&n)!=-1){
        int out=0;
        for(int ok, i=01234;i<98765&&i*n<100000;i++){
            sprintf(s,"%05d",i);sprintf(s+5,"%05d",i*n);
            ok=1;for(int j=0;j<10;j++)a[j]=0;
            for(int j=0;j<10&&ok;j++)
                if(a[s[j]-'0'])ok=0;
                else a[s[j]-'0']=1;
            if(ok){
                out=1;
                printf("%05d/%05d=%d\n",i*n,i,n);
            }
        }
        if(out==0)printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
/*
input:
62
12
2
33
output:
79546/01283=62
94736/01528=62
45792/03816=12
73548/06129=12
89532/07461=12
91584/07632=12
13458/06729=2
13584/06792=2
13854/06927=2
14538/07269=2
14586/07293=2
14658/07329=2
15384/07692=2
15846/07923=2
15864/07932=2
18534/09267=2

18654/09327=2
26970/13485=2

27690/13845=2
29076/14538=2
29370/14685=2

29706/14853=2

30972/15486=2
32970/16485=2
37092/18546=2
37290/18645=2
41358/20679=2
41538/20769=2

46158/23079=2
